level.description: You must use the BUGCATCHER Tool to catch bugs. Look at the code. Which line is incorrect? Go to that line. Press CTRL to throw the BUGCATCHER at the bug!
level.introtext: Finding bugs requires CODE TRACING. This requires you to manually read the code and try to understand it to find the bug.
level.endtext: You got it! You can now use BUGCATCHERS!
